meanings.sent1: She kept misfocussing on the wrong details during the presentation.
meanings.sent2: He is misfocussing on his homework, so he keeps making mistakes.
meanings.sent3: The cat is misfocussing on the toy mouse, thinking it's real.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was misfocussing like a camera with a broken lens, unable to capture the right image.
meanings.sent5: Misfocussing on the road ahead led to a wrong turn and a longer journey.

meanings.definition: The act of focusing incorrectly or poorly.
meanings.sent1: Her constant misfocussing was affecting her work performance.
meanings.sent2: The misfocussing of the camera resulted in blurry photos.
meanings.sent3: The misfocussing of the students during the lecture made the teacher chuckle.
meanings.sent4: The misfocussing of the spotlight created a dramatic effect on the stage.
meanings.sent5: The misfocussing of the telescope made the stars appear like tiny dots in the sky.
